channel.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
channel.description: I have already made the portal work and everything, but i was wondering how would u go making it so an item requirement for it, and if possible removing that item as they go through. Help appreciated thanks.

item.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @eboone1234 eboone1234
item.description:
@eboone1234 wrote:

thanks for your help i figured it out.

item.source: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]

item.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:7, topic:508598”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=626837.msg4261491#msg4261491 date=1363499547]
Why not check if they have the item, and if they do. Delete it and make em teleport, and if they don’t send the message?
[/quote]

That’s what it does, except it handles the errors first.[/quote]
Usually I’d see it like this (not correct):

if(playerhas X or greaterof Item){ remove X of item; teleport em(X,Y,H); }else{ Get X of Item; }

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @eboone1234 eboone1234
item.description:
@eboone1234 wrote:

it’s probably wrong… but this is what i put so far
if (!c.playerHasItem(18328,1)) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t enter this portal”);
return;
}

            c.getItems().deleteItem(18328,1);
	c.getPA().movePlayer(2741, 5080, 0);
	c.sendMessage("You teleported to level 2.");
	break;

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

It might be playerHasItem(int,int)

The second int would be the amount of the item.

item.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @eboone1234 eboone1234
item.description:
@eboone1234 wrote:

Ah i get an error while loading it, i want it to take an item out of their inventory please.
source\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:983: error: cannot find symbol
if (!c.playerHasItem(18328)) {
^
symbol: method playerHasItem(int)
location: variable c of type Client
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]

item.title: How to make a portal have item requirements? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

		if (!c.playerHasItem(#)) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't enter this portal");
			return;
		}
		
		c.getItems().deleteItem(#,1);

Something along these lines.

You should be more specific with your item requirements. Would they need to be wearing a certain item to go through? Or in the inventory.

Does the item get permanently deleted, or removed to the inventory.

Read full topic
